verses.verse: In the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the king,<WH4428> in the sixth<WH8345> month,<WH2320> in the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> the Word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came by<WH3027> Haggai,<WH2292> the prophet,<WH5030> to Zerubbabel,<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH7597> governor<WH6346> of Judah,<WH3063> and to Joshua,<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> saying,<WH559>

"This is what<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> says:<WH559> These people<WH5971> say,<WH559> <WH6256> 'The time hasn't<WH935> yet come, the time<WH6256> for Yahweh<WH3068>'s house<WH1004> to be built.<WH1129>'"
Then the Word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came by<WH3027> Haggai,<WH2292> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559>
"Is it a time<WH6256> for you yourselves to dwell<WH3427> in your paneled<WH5603> houses,<WH1004> while this house<WH1004> lies waste?<WH2720>
Now therefore this is what Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> says:<WH559> Consider<WH7760> your ways.<WH1870>

You have sown<WH2232> much,<WH7235> and bring<WH935> in little.<WH4592> You eat,<WH398> but you don't<WH7654> have enough. You drink,<WH8354> but you aren't<WH7937> filled with drink. You clothe<WH3847> yourselves,<WH2527> but no one is warm, and he who earns wages<WH7936> earns wages<WH7936> to put them into a bag<WH6872> with holes in it.<WH5344>"
This is what Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> says:<WH559> "Consider<WH7760> your ways.<WH1870>

Go up<WH5927> to the mountain,<WH2022> bring<WH935> wood,<WH6086> and build<WH1129> the house.<WH1004> I will take pleasure<WH7521> in it,<WH3513> and I will be glorified," says<WH559> Yahweh.<WH3068>

"You looked<WH6437> for much,<WH7235> and,<WH4592> behold, it came to little; and when you brought<WH935> it home,<WH1004> I blew<WH5301> it away.<WH5002> Why?" says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> "Because<WH3282> of my house<WH1004> that lies waste,<WH2720> while each of you is busy<WH7323> with his<WH376> own house.<WH1004>
Therefore for your sake the heavens<WH8064> withhold<WH3607> the dew,<WH2919> and the earth<WH776> withholds<WH3607> its fruit.<WH2981>

I called<WH7121> for a drought<WH2721> on the land,<WH776> on the mountains,<WH2022> on the grain,<WH1715> on the new wine,<WH8492> on the oil,<WH3323> on that which the ground<WH127> brings forth,<WH3318> on men,<WH120> on livestock,<WH929> and on all the labor<WH3018> of the hands.<WH3709>"

Then Zerubbabel,<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH7597> and Joshua,<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> with all the remnant<WH7611> of the people,<WH5971> obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh,<WH3068> their God,<WH430> and the words<WH1697> of Haggai,<WH2292> the prophet,<WH5030> as Yahweh,<WH3068> their God,<WH430> had sent<WH7971> him;<WH5971> and the people feared<WH3372> <WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
Then Haggai,<WH2292> Yahweh<WH3068>'s messenger,<WH4397> spoke<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068>'s message<WH4400> to the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "I am with you,<WH5002>" says Yahweh.<WH3068>

Yahweh<WH3068> stirred up<WH5782> the spirit<WH7307> of Zerubbabel,<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel,<WH7597> governor<WH6346> of Judah,<WH3063> and the spirit<WH7307> of Joshua,<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jehozadak,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> and the spirit<WH7307> of all the remnant<WH7611> of the people;<WH5971> and they came<WH935> and<WH6213> worked<WH4399> on the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> their God,<WH430>
in the twenty<WH6242> - fourth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH8345> in the sixth month,<WH2320> in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the king.<WH4428>
